snippet.title: USSR - Urban Smash Street Racing - Evolution Studios pre Motorstorm Apocalypse Animatic
snippet.description:
I wanted to post this up as i found it on an old backup drive.

Back in 2007 i was asked to work on an animatic for a destructive street racing game.  The game involved racing around cities and causing mayhem and destruction and being quite Fight Club Tyler Durden about most things :p

The project was unfortunately dropped BUT it lived on in the guise of Motorstorm Apocalypse (which i also worked on).  Sadly after Driveclub was completed Evolution Studios shut down only recently.

This animatic was quickly rushed out in under two weeks - i did most of the animation and camera work for the shots.
